title: Snapchat +: Deceptive Pricing, Disappointing Experience
text:
I am incredibly disappointed with the deceptive pricing and greedy practices of Snapchat's premium features. After shelling out $3.99 for Snapchat Premium, I was shocked to discover that it didn't include an ad-free experience as I had assumed. To add insult to injury, removing ads requires an additional $14 or so, making the true cost far beyond what was initially implied.

This blatant attempt to squeeze even more money out of users is beyond frustrating. It feels like a betrayal of trust and a slap in the face to loyal customers. Snapchat, you should be ashamed of yourselves for resorting to such underhanded tactics.

Moreover, the recent move to squeeze 4-second ads into 10-second snaps is beyond annoying. It's clear that Snapchat is trying to push users into subscribing, but they fail to realize that other apps like Instagram offer a better "story experience" without highly annoying ads that interrupt mid-10-second snaps.

I urge others to think twice before investing in Snapchat's premium features, as it's clear that their priority lies not in providing value to users, but in lining their pockets at any cost. Save your money and look elsewhere for a platform that respects its users and doesn't engage in such deceptive practices.

text:
Thank you for permanently deleting my account for â€œdrug contentâ€ - Iâ€™ve been using Snapchat for over 8 years as my preferred messaging app and I will never be using it again. Iâ€™ve lost so many memories, messages and photos with people that are no longer with us, I am heartbroken. Your offer to download content while my account was under review did not work. Thank you for deleting my account and erasing all my chat memories - I havenâ€™t used your app since. Your new More Snapchat ad campaign is hilariousâ€¦read your reviews.

title: Why am I dealing with thisâ€¦
text:
I had an account for about two years and I have never promoted alcohol or drugs on my stories or to other people. I went to Snapchat one day and it was locked for â€œprohibited drug contentâ€. What? I have never heard posted drug content! The only thing I can think of is when I shared my Instagram QR code on my story that had mushroom emojis on it. That is still ridiculous! 

I have been trying to appeal my account for five days now and Snapchat said they are usually aiding Snapchat users within 24-48 hours. I am tired of waiting on my account getting appealed and I am not allowed to make another account because my IP is banned. I donâ€™t think Iâ€™ll ever use Snapchat every again due to this chaos. 

Screw you Snapchat.
